title: Create user facing outputs of tiltIndicators
code: library(tiltIndicatorAfter) library(tiltToyData) library(readr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)  options(readr.show_col_types = FALSE)  packageVersion("tiltIndicatorAfter") #> [1] '0.0.0.9016'  companies <- read_csv(toy_emissions_profile_any_companies()) products <- read_csv(toy_emissions_profile_products()) #> Warning: `toy_emissions_profile_products()` was deprecated in tiltToyData 0.0.0.9009. #> ℹ Please use `toy_emissions_profile_products_ecoinvent()` instead. #> This warning is displayed once every 8 hours. #> Call `lifecycle::last_lifecycle_warnings()` to see where this warning was #> generated. europages_companies <- read_csv(toy_europages_companies()) ecoinvent_activities <- read_csv(toy_ecoinvent_activities()) ecoinvent_europages <- read_csv(toy_ecoinvent_europages()) isic_name <- read_csv(toy_isic_name())  result <- profile_emissions(   companies,   products,   europages_companies = europages_companies,   ecoinvent_activities = ecoinvent_activities,   ecoinvent_europages = ecoinvent_europages,   isic = isic_name )  result |> unnest_product() #> #
